mapper.insert: insert into record (u_id, r_name, r_describe, r_open, r_genre) values(#{u_id}, #{r_name}, #{r_describe}, #{r_open}, #{r_genre})
mapper.delete: delete r, u from record r left join upload u on (r.r_num = u.r_num) where r.r_num = #{r_num}
mapper.select: select distinct r.u_id, u_nick, i.u_path, i.u_image from user u left join record r on(u.u_id= r.u_id) left join u_imgupload i on(i.u_id = u.u_id)
mapper.delete: delete from likey where u_id = #{u_id} and r_num = #{r_num}
